CustomField.inlineHelpText: End Customer Specified Provider (SP): End customer selected SP to purchase/ install or provide services on their behalf. Independent Software Vendor (ISV): Specializes in developing and selling software solutions. Solution Provider: Contracted to sell & service NCR solutions in defined territory. Strategic Alliance Partner: Partner and NCR undertake mutually beneficial program. System Integrator (SI): Markets commercially integrated solutions.
CustomField.label: Sub Account Type
